text: A view of Gondomar stadium. Estadio de São Miguel is a multi-use stadium in Gondomar, Portugal. It is currently used mostly for football matches and is the home stadium of Gondomar SC. The stadium is able to hold 2,450 people. Sao Miguel Category:Sports venues in Porto District Category:Buildings and structures in Gondomar, Portugal Category:Sport in Gondomar, Portugal
title: Estádio de São Miguel (Gondomar)
